info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 8:42PM EDT until May 13 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR EASTERN MECKLENBURG AND SOUTH CENTRAL LUNENBURG COUNTIES... At 842 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Hill, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... South Hill around 850 PM EDT. La Crosse around 855 PM EDT. Brodnax around 900 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include North View, Beechwood, Baskerville, Bracey and Wightman. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
